A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This wasn't Star Wars.  I am an old school fan and know Star Wars when I see  it\, and this wasn't it.  Mary Poppins Leia\, a casino with people in tuxedos\, class warfare\, \"Godspeed rebels\" from the purple haired Holdo\, the list goes on.  This was worse than the prequels!  A sad day omsee what they've done to the most beloved franchise.
